action.text: SA 5138 (the instructions of the motion to refer) fell when SA 5137 fell.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).

Amendment SA 5138 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 5137 (the instructions of the motion to refer). (consideration: CR S3362; text: CR S3496) To modify the effective date.
